articles.title: US won't send some weapons pledged to Ukraine following a Pentagon review of military aid.
articles.description: The U.S. has decided to halt some weapons shipments to Ukraine after a review of military aid.

articles.title: 'Murderous freefall': Over 600 Palestinians seeking food killed in 5 weeks.
articles.description: More than 600 Palestinians seeking food have been killed in the past 5 weeks.

articles.title: Germany updates: Cabinet approves family reunification curbs.
articles.description: The German cabinet has approved curbs on family reunification for refugees.
